GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
HID: cp2112: prevent a buffer overflow in cp2112_xfer()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 519ff31a6ddd87aa4905bd9bf3b92e8b88801614, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 542134c0375b5ca2b1d18490c02b8a20bfdd8d74. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: cp2112: prevent a buffer overflow in cp2112_xfer()
OSV.details:
